SELECT M_NUM "mNum" , OP_NAME "opName" , OP_PRICE "opPrice" , RECIPENO "recipeno" FROM RECIPE WHERE S_ID= #{sId} AND M_NUM = #{mNum} AND( CA_NUM = 'CAOP' OR CA_NUM = 'CAIC' OR CA_NUM = 'CAHT') ORDER BY OP_NAME

SELECT C_ID "cId" , C_NICK "cNick" , C_TEL "cTel" , C_NAME "cName" , MILEAGE "mileage" , S_ID "sId" FROM POSCUSSEARCH_VIEW WHERE S_ID= #{sId} AND (C_TEL like '%' || #{cTel} || '%' OR C_NAME like '%' || #{cTel} || '%')
